```{r}
library(raster)
library(landscapeR)

nlcd_mt <- raster("../R_output_files/nlcd/nlcd_mt.tif")
nlcd_mt[nlcd_mt==0] <- NA
stranded_mt <- raster("../R_output_files/nlcd/nlcd_mt_stranded.tif")
stranded_mt[stranded_mt>0] <- 1

nlcd_stranded <- cover(stranded_mt,nlcd_mt)
```

```{r}

test <- landscapeR::expandClass(nlcd_stranded,class = 1,500)

```
